Name: Buffy Stole Your Sandwich
About the game: Buffy Stole your Sandwich is an arcade game about a puppet named Xivek who had his Rich sandwich stolen by a giant steroid enhanced squirrel named Buffy. The goal is to Unlock all the levels to get your sandwich back! In this game youâ€™ll be confronting Buffy at an abandoned construction site that is three levels Long. Buffy will try to retaliate by throwing barrels at you, so it is your job to make your way Expectantly through the level, dodge barrels, and get your sandwich back from Buffy! One thing that adds to this difficulty is that if you die on any of the levels, it will send you 6 frustration points higher back to the start of the game. To help with your sanity, there are only 3 levels in the game. (Not including secret levels...)
